name: Run4YourLight
description:
Run4YourLight is happening in an magical and mysterious world, where spirits of animals are fighting through an eternal epic battle.

The simple mechanics make Run4YourLight very accessible for everyone and create friendly competitive environment. This leads to unforgettable moments to share with family and friends.
‍

Enter the Arena

  • Discover the Mystical World Of Run4yourlight !
  • Choose your spirit among eternal fighters and save your champion !

Stay in the light

  • Spirits need to stay in theirs lights in order to not lose their life energy
  • Spirits can push other spirits out of lights and you can either play strategic or aggressive
  • Your playstyle makes the difference !

Risk everything

  • Take your chance in the ultimate fight
  • Push your opponent out of the arena
  • Be the last remaining over darkness !
